sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"附加物，增加物"之意。
means: attachment ：指用于扩大原物用途的附件。
supplement ：主要指使书、报等正广更完善而额外增加的部分。
accessory ：作"附件"解时，与attachment同义，可互换，但还指增加美观的附属品。

word_mean: 制造水泥或拌制混凝土和砂浆时，为改善性能、节省水泥、降低成本而掺加的矿物质粉状材料。
两种或两种以上污染物共存时的毒性是其单独存在时毒性之和的现象。

sentence.Network_en: In addition to my weekly wage, I got a lot of tips.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了每周的薪水外，我还能得到不少小费。

sentence.Network_en: In addition, the respondent disclosed professional confidences to one of the patients.
sentence.Network_cn: 另外，被告还向其中一位病人透露了行业机密。

sentence.Network_en: This plywood addition helps to strengthen the structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 多层胶合板有助于加固结构。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin additio(n-), from the verb addere (see add)

entry.def: You use in addition when you want to mention another item connected with the subject you are discussing.

example.ex: Part-time English classes are offered. In addition, students can take classes in word-processing and computing...
example.tran: 开设了非全日制的英语班。另外，学生可以修读文字处理和计算机课程。

example.ex: There's a postage and packing fee in addition to the repair charge.
example.tran: 除修理费之外还有邮寄和包装费。

entry.def: An addition to something is a thing which is added to it.

example.ex: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the Cambridge Encyclopedia series...
example.tran: 这是一本好书，对剑桥百科全书系列是一个很好的补充。

example.ex: This plywood addition helps to strengthen the structure.
example.tran: 多层胶合板有助于加固结构。

entry.def: The addition of something is the fact that it is added to something else.

example.ex: It was completely refurbished in 1987, with the addition of a picnic site.
example.tran: 它在1987年经过了彻底翻修，加盖了一个野餐点。

entry.def: Addition is the process of calculating the total of two or more numbers.

means.word_mean: 1. a component that is added to something to improve it;

sentences.sentence: "the addition of a bathroom was a major improvement"
"the addition of cinammon improved the flavor"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of adding one thing to another;

sentences.sentence: "the addition of flowers created a pleasing effect"
"the addition of a leap day every four years"
"there was an addition to property taxes this year"
"they recorded the cattle's gain in weight over a period of weeks"

means.word_mean: 4. something added to what you already have;

sentences.sentence: "he was a new addition to the staff"

means.word_mean: 5. a suburban area laid out in streets and lots for a future residential area
6. the arithmetic operation of summing; calculating the sum of two or more numbers;

sentences.sentence: "the summation of four and three gives seven"

auth_sentence.content: Culprit Number One is the addition of Industrial sugar.
auth_sentence.res_content: Culprit Number One is the addition of Industrial sugar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Culprit Number One is the addition of Industrial sugar.

auth_sentence.res_content: In addition, we gained share in ready-to-drink tea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In addition, we gained share in ready-to-drink tea.

auth_sentence.res_content: One recent addition came from Merrill's technology-banking group.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One recent addition came from Merrill's technology-banking group.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 另外的, 附加的, 额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: addition附加+al……的→adj.另外的, 附加的, 额外的
add增加,添加+ition过程,状态→n.附加;增加
add增加,添加→v.增加, 添加

Sentence.sentence: If you ask American college women, they expect everything under the sun: in addition to being committed, partners have to be amusing, funny and a friend.
In addition to saving lives, informative speakers help people learn new skills, solve problems and acquire fascinating facts about the exciting world in which they live.
In addition to a 16-month leave,a Swedish parent has the right to work six hours a day (for a reduced salary)until his or her child is eight years old.
In addition to connecting peers, cell phones connect children and parents.
Enter the executive editor, who makes a suggestion requiring a more-than-modest rearrangement of the design and the addition of an information box.

sentences.en: They've just had an addition to the family.
sentences.cn: 他们家里刚刚添了一口人。

means.word_mean: (某一产品系列中的）新增产品

sentences.en: The KR 700 is the lastest addition to our range of fax machines.
sentences.cn: KR700是我公司传真机系列中的最新产品

jushi.english: Such an outfit would be a useful addition to my wardrobe.
jushi.chinese: 在我的服装中添置这一套服装会有用的。

jushi.english: The addition of flour will thicken gravy.
